item.description:
Let's meet at Cambridge Common, located near Harvard Square on Mass Ave. For a map of the park in relation to Harvard Square, click here.

We'll meet at 4:00 on Saturday and throw the ball around while getting to know each others' names. After warming up we'll get a game going! Check our About Us page for a full list of game rules, group policies and rule modifications. At 6:30 or so we'll head over to UNO's to finish up with conversation over food/drinks.

For those who take public transportation, the Harvard T stop and 66 bus stop are a couple blocks away (see the map). A map of nearby metered locations can be found here. Send me a note if you have any questions!

**Please remember we play for FUN! Don't come expecting to play a rugged game of flag football. While we are competitive, we're not aggressive. Let's use this opportunity to befriend others interested in the game.
item.name: Flag Football on Cambridge Common
